column1: # Name: Number of police officers per 100,000, total

# Definition: Personnel in public agencies as of 31 December whose principal functions are the prevention, detection and investigation of crime and the apprehension of alleged offenders. Data concerning support staff (secretaries, clerts, etc.) should be excluded.
# Source: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
